purpose: This script uses imagemagick to resize an image to fit the specification of android "drawable" images.

args.name: base_dir
args.description: The place to output the resized files to. Defaults to the current directory

exit_codes.2: If the given file does not exist
exit_codes.3: If the given base directory does not exist

examples.purpose: Resize an icon called my_icon.png, where the base directory is projects/MyApp/src/res/
